NK047(tsi)001:1: // byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pa'i sgom
NK047(tsi)001:2: rim rab gsal nyi ma zhes bya ba bzhugs so
NK047(tsi)001:3: // bder gshegs chos kyi sku mnga' sras bcas dang //
NK047(tsi)001:4: phyag 'os kun la'ang gus par phyag 'tshal te //
NK047(tsi)001:5: bde gshegs sras kyi sdom la 'jug pa ni //
NK047(tsi)001:6: lung bzhin mdor bsdus nas ni brjod par bya //
NK047(tsi)001:8: gang 'jug pa po rten gyi gang zag /
NK047(tsi)001:10: tshul ji ltar 'jug pa'i sbyor ba /
NK047(tsi)001:12: dang po rten gyi gang zag ni dal 'byor thob cing dad dang snying rje ldan pa'o //
NK047(tsi)001:13: gnyis pa bsam pa sems bskyed pa 'di la smon 'jug gnyis /
NK047(tsi)001:15: sems bskyed pa ni gzhan don phyir //
NK047(tsi)001:16: yang dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dod //
NK047(tsi)001:17: ces gsungs pas gzhan don du sangs rgyas thob 'dod kyi bsam pa /
NK047(tsi)001:19: rgyal ba'i sras kyi bslab bya la slob par dam bca' pa /
NK047(tsi)001:20: de lta bu'i sems bskyed de rang rgyud la bzung
NK047(tsi)001:21: bar bya ba la bla ma las len na dbu
NK047(tsi)001:22: sems gang rung gi cho ga ltar bya /
NK047(tsi)001:23: 'dir sdom pa rang nyid kyis blang ba'i tshul la sbyor dngos rjes gsum /
NK047(tsi)001:24: dang po sbyor ba la gsum /
NK047(tsi)001:25: phan yon gyi brod pa bskyed pa spyod 'jug le'u dang po ltar bya /
NK047(tsi)001:26: tshogs bsags pa yan lag bdun pa bya ba'i dang
NK047(tsi)001:27: po tshogs zhing rgyal ba sras bcas mngon sum du
NK047(tsi)001:28: bzhugs pa'i spyan sngar rang gzhan sems can thams cad
NK047(tsi)001:29: lhan gcig tu rgyal ba sras bcas kyi yon tan
NK047(tsi)001:30: rjes su dran pa dang bcas yan lag bdun pa
NK047(tsi)001:32: dang po mchod pa'i yan lag /
NK047(tsi)001:33: me tog bdug spos mar me chu gtsang gi yon
NK047(tsi)001:34: chab bza' btung sna tshogs pa'i zhal zas la sogs
NK047(tsi)001:35: ci 'byor ba'i mchod pa dngos su bshams /
NK047(tsi)001:36: rin po che'i ri bo yid du 'ong ba'i nags tshal /
NK047(tsi)001:37: dben zhing nyams dga' ba'i sa phyogs sogs phyogs bcu'i
NK047(tsi)001:38: 'jig rten na yod pa rnams blos blang nas 'bul
NK047(tsi)001:39: ba bdag pos yongs su ma bzung ba'i mchod pa
NK047(tsi)001:40: gnyis po rin chen sems de sogs kyis 'bul /
NK047(tsi)001:41: rgyal dang de sras sogs kyis rang gi sgo gsum bran du 'bul ba'i mchod pa /
NK047(tsi)001:42: khrus kyi khang pa sogs kyis yid kyi sprul pa'i mchod pa /
NK047(tsi)001:43: de las gzhan yang sogs kyis smon lam stobs kyi mchod pa /
NK047(tsi)001:44: ji ltar 'jam dbyangs sogs kyis bla na med pa'i mchod pa /
NK047(tsi)001:45: yon tan rgya mtsho sogs kyis bstod pa dbyangs kyi mchod pa /
NK047(tsi)001:46: dus gsum bzhugs sogs kyis gus pa phyag gi mchod
NK047(tsi)001:47: pa dang brgyad po tshig rjes don dran snying thag
NK047(tsi)001:48: pa nas bya / de dag kyang zhing dag pa dkon mchog gsum gyi spyan sngar /
NK047(tsi)001:49: dngos po dag pa sdig pa dang ma 'dres shing ser snas ma bcing pa /
NK047(tsi)001:50: bsam pa dag pa lan dang rnam smin la re ba med pa'i sems kyis 'bul ba'o //
NK047(tsi)001:52: yul khyad par can theg chen thun mong ma yin pa'i dkon mchog gsum la /
NK047(tsi)001:53: bsam pa khyad par can sems can thams cad kyi don du /
NK047(tsi)001:54: dus rdzogs pa'i byang chub ma thob bar du skyabs
NK047(tsi)001:55: su 'gro snyams pas byang chub snying po sogs lan
NK047(tsi)001:56: gsum bya / gsum pa sdig pa bshags pa phyogs
NK047(tsi)001:57: rnams sogs kyis bshags yul la mkhyen par gsol te
NK047(tsi)001:58: sngar byas kyi sdig pa la khong du dug song
NK047(tsi)001:59: gsum bya / ba lta bu / rten dkon mchog
NK047(tsi)001:60: gsum la dug nad gso ba'i sman pa lta bu
NK047(tsi)001:61: gsum bya / ba lta bu / / gnyen po dam pa'i chos la sman lta bu /
NK047(tsi)001:62: phyin chad ni byed pa'i sdom sems la lus zung
NK047(tsi)001:63: gso ba'i bcud len bdud rtsi lta bu'i 'du shes
NK047(tsi)001:65: thog ma med ldan sogs kyis sun 'byin pa'i stobs /
NK047(tsi)001:66: de bas rgyal ba sogs rten gyi stobs /
NK047(tsi)001:67: tha mal nad kyis sogs kyis gnyen po kun spyod kyi stobs /
NK047(tsi)001:68: 'di ni bzang po zhes rkang pa gnyis kyis sdom pa'i stobs rnams snying thag pa nas bya'o //
NK047(tsi)001:69: bzhi pa rjes su yi rang ba 'jig rten dang
NK047(tsi)001:70: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge rtsa 'bras bu dang
NK047(tsi)001:71: bcas pa kun la snying thag pa nas dga' zhing
NK047(tsi)001:72: rjes su yi rang ba dang bcas /
NK047(tsi)001:74: lnga pa chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bskul ba dang /
NK047(tsi)001:75: drug pa mya ngan las mi 'da' bar gsol ba 'debs pa /
NK047(tsi)001:76: bdun pa bsngo ba rnams phyogs rnams sogs kyi tshig don dran par bya /
NK047(tsi)001:77: de nas blo sbyangs ba lus dang de bzhin sogs
NK047(tsi)001:78: kyis rang gi lus longs spyod dus gsum bsags pa'i
NK047(tsi)001:79: dge ba dang bcas pa sems can gyi don bsgrub
NK047(tsi)001:80: pa'i phyir du phangs pa med par bsngosa te gnas
NK047(tsi)001:81: skabs dang mthar thug kun tu 'gro ba'i nyer 'tsho
NK047(tsi)001:82: bla na med pa'i rgyu snying thag pa nas smon
NK047(tsi)001:84: gnyis pa dngos gzhi dgongs gsol sngon du 'gro bas
NK047(tsi)001:85: ji ltar sngon gyi sogs lan gsum gyis smon 'jug
NK047(tsi)001:88: deng du bdag sogs kyi rang dga' ba bsgom /
NK047(tsi)001:89: bdag gi de ring sogs kyis gzhan dga' ba sgom du gzhugs /
NK047(tsi)001:90: de dag gi rjes su byang chub sems mchog sogs kyis smon lam yang bya'o //
NK047(tsi)001:91: des bsam pa byang chub kyi sems rang rgyud la bzung ba de song /
NK047(tsi)001:92: gsum pa tshul ji ltar 'jug pa'i sbyor ba la
NK047(tsi)001:93: nyams len pha rol tu phyin pa drug tu 'du
NK047(tsi)001:94: bas de dag gi ngo bo rim pa bzhin /
NK047(tsi)001:95: khyad chos bzhi dang ldan pa'i gtong sems /
NK047(tsi)001:100: chos rab tu rnam par 'byed pa rnams yin /
NK047(tsi)001:102: sbyin pa mi mthun phyogs nyams dang /
NK047(tsi)001:103: rnam par mi rtog ye shes ldan /
NK047(tsi)001:104: 'dod pa thams cad yongs rdzogs byed /
NK047(tsi)001:105: sems can yongs smin byed rnam gsum /
NK047(tsi)001:107: mi mthun pa'i phyogs ni rim pa bzhin ser sna /
NK047(tsi)001:113: sems can gyi 'dod pa yongs su rdzogs tshul ni /
NK047(tsi)001:114: sbyin pas longs spyod sogs sbyin /
NK047(tsi)001:115: tshul khrims kyis yid dwangs bar byed /
NK047(tsi)001:116: bzod pas gnod pa dang du len /
NK047(tsi)001:117: brtson 'grus kyis dgos pa'i grogs byed /
NK047(tsi)001:118: bsam gtan gyis rdzu 'phrul dang mngon shes kyis 'dun par byed /
NK047(tsi)001:119: shes rab kyis blang dor gyi gnas ston par byed /
NK047(tsi)001:120: de dag gis 'dod pa yongs su rdzogs par byas
NK047(tsi)001:121: te dngos sam brgyud nas nyan thos rang rgyal rdzogs
NK047(tsi)001:122: pa'i byang chub gsum gang rung la 'god pa sems
NK047(tsi)001:123: can yongs smin byed pa yin /
NK047(tsi)001:124: de lta bu'i pha rol tu phyin pa de dag
NK047(tsi)001:125: kyang sems sbyong ba'i spyod pa la 'du ba'i tshul
NK047(tsi)001:126: / dang po sbyin pa ni rang gi lus longs
NK047(tsi)001:127: spyod dus gsum gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang bcas
NK047(tsi)001:128: pa thams cad ma btang ba'i nyes dmigs /
NK047(tsi)001:130: gtong dgos pa'i rgyu mtshan sogs bsam nas snying thag pa nas gtong sems sbyong ba de yin /
NK047(tsi)001:131: gnyis pa tshul khrims la srung byed thabs dang /
NK047(tsi)001:132: des ji ltar bsrung tshul gnyis /
NK047(tsi)001:133: dang po srung byed kyi thabs la 'jug ldog gi gnas la gzob pa'i bag yod /
NK047(tsi)001:134: blang dor mi brjed pa'i dran pa /
NK047(tsi)001:135: sgo gsum gyi gnas skabs la brtags pa'i shes bzhin dang gsum /
NK047(tsi)001:136: gnyis pa des ji ltar srung tshul /
NK047(tsi)001:137: dang po dran pas blang dor mi brjed par byas
NK047(tsi)001:138: te shes bzhin gyis rang gi lus ngag yid gsum
NK047(tsi)001:139: gyi gnas skabs la brtag nas bsgrub bya dge ba'i
NK047(tsi)001:140: phyogs dang du mi len pa dang /
NK047(tsi)001:141: spang bya mi dge ba la 'jug 'dod kyi bsam pa nam skyes ngo shes par bya /
NK047(tsi)001:142: de'i tshe bag yod kyis dge ba'i phan yon dran nas dang du blang zhing /
NK047(tsi)001:143: nyes spyod mi dge ba'i phyogs kyi nyes dmigs dran nas spang bar bya ba la bslab /
NK047(tsi)001:144: de dag gi rgyu yang las 'bras la yid ches
NK047(tsi)001:145: pa yin pas rgyal ba'i bka' 'khrul ba med pa'i
NK047(tsi)001:146: rjes su 'brang ste yid ches bskyed /
NK047(tsi)001:147: de nas mi dge ba byas na ngan song du 'gro nges /
NK047(tsi)001:148: ngan song du skyes na sdug bsngal 'di lta bu yod pas /
NK047(tsi)001:149: gzhan don lta ci rang don yang mi 'grub snyams
NK047(tsi)001:150: du 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal dran pa 'di snying nas
NK047(tsi)001:152: bsrung bya rnam grangs mang yang smon sems kyi mi mthun phyogs sems can blos btang ba /
NK047(tsi)001:153: nyan rang gi sar sems bskyed pa /
NK047(tsi)001:154: nag po'i chos bzhi spang pa gsum gtso bor srung /
NK047(tsi)001:156: mchod 'os bslu dang 'gyod med 'gyod pa bskyed //
NK047(tsi)001:157: dam par skur 'debs 'gro la g.yo sgyus spyod //
NK047(tsi)001:158: nag po'i chos bzhi spangs shing ldog pa ni //
NK047(tsi)001:159: dkar po'i chos bzhi yin pas kun tu spyad //
NK047(tsi)001:161: mthun phyogs 'bras bu rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang de'i
NK047(tsi)001:162: rgyu byang chub kyi spyod pa la snying thag pa
NK047(tsi)001:163: nas mos pa / gzhan gyi dge ba gang byed kun la snying nas spro bas yi rang /
NK047(tsi)001:164: de dag gi dge rtsa gzhan don rdzogs byang du bsngo ba ste /
NK047(tsi)001:165: theg chen gyi bsgom lam gsum po 'di kho na nyams su blangs /
NK047(tsi)001:166: 'jug sdom gyi mi mthun phyogs spyir gzhan gnod gzhir bcas spongs pa dang /
NK047(tsi)001:167: khyad par nyes dmigs che shos /
NK047(tsi)001:168: dkon mchog gi dkor phrog pa /
NK047(tsi)001:169: byang sems la skur ba 'debs pa /
NK047(tsi)001:170: chos spong gi las byed pa sogs srog dang bsdos te bsrung /
NK047(tsi)001:171: mthun phyogs dge rtsa phra mo tshun chad khyad du
NK047(tsi)001:172: mi gsod par dam pa gsum gyis zin par nyams
NK047(tsi)001:174: gsum pa bzod pa'i pha rol phyin pa la /
NK047(tsi)001:175: bzod pa'i yul bdag la brnyas pa byed pa dang /
NK047(tsi)001:177: lkog tu mi snyan smra ba /
NK047(tsi)001:178: sdug bsngal byed pa dang bzhi /
NK047(tsi)001:179: bdag gi bla ma dang mdza' bshes sogs la de ltar bzhi byed pa dang /
NK047(tsi)001:180: bdag gi dgra dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs la bde ba byed pa /
NK047(tsi)001:183: snyan par smra ba bzhi ste mi 'dod pa bcu gnyis /
NK047(tsi)001:184: de dag las ldog pa 'dod pa bcu gnyis kyi
NK047(tsi)001:185: gegs byed pa ste bzod pa'i yul nyi shu rtsa
NK047(tsi)001:186: bzhi'o // de dag re re bzhin yang rgyu mtshan
NK047(tsi)001:187: dang rgyu de dag las byung ba'i sdug bsngal gyis
NK047(tsi)001:188: mi skyo ba sdug bsngal dang len /
NK047(tsi)001:189: byed pa po gang zag la mi khro ba gnod
NK047(tsi)001:190: byed la ci mi snyam pa stong nyid zab mo'i
NK047(tsi)001:191: don la blo 'jog pa dang gsum gsum gyis bzod
NK047(tsi)001:192: par byed pa'i nang tshan bzod pa'i rnam grangs bdun
NK047(tsi)001:193: cu rtsa gnyis la gom par byed pa'o //
NK047(tsi)001:194: de yang rgyu mtshan gsum gyis sdug bsngal dang du len te /
NK047(tsi)001:195: sdug bsngal la brten nas bdag gi sdig pa 'dzad
NK047(tsi)001:196: pas sdug bsngal sdig pa'i phyag mar shes nas dang
NK047(tsi)001:197: du blang / sdug bsngal la brten nas 'khor ba la nges 'byung sems can la snying rje /
NK047(tsi)001:198: dge sdig la blang dor sogs skye bas sdug bsngal dge ba'i bskul mar shes nas dang du blang /
NK047(tsi)001:199: sdug bsngal gyis nga rgyal gyi mgo gnon /
NK047(tsi)001:200: phrag dog gi zur bcom 'dod chags kyi dbal 'joms /
NK047(tsi)001:201: dngos grub kyi sna 'dren pas sdug bsngal sems kyi rgyan du shes nas dang du blang /
NK047(tsi)001:202: rgyu mtshan gsum gyis gnod byed la ci mi snyam pa'i bzod pa sgom ste /
NK047(tsi)001:203: sems can rmong pa nyon mongs kyis dbang du gyur
NK047(tsi)001:204: nas rang la'ang gnod pa byed na gzhan la lta
NK047(tsi)001:205: ci smos snyam du gnod byed snying rje'i yul du
NK047(tsi)001:207: de'ang rang gi sngon byas kyi las dang 'phral gyi
NK047(tsi)001:208: spyod lam mi bzob pas bdag la gnod byed rnams
NK047(tsi)001:209: byung ba yin snyam du le len thams cad rang
NK047(tsi)001:210: la bda' zhing bzod pa sgom /
NK047(tsi)001:211: dgra la brten nas bdag gi bzod pa'i tshogs rdzogs
NK047(tsi)001:212: shing byang chub spyod pa'i grogs su 'gyur bas phan
NK047(tsi)001:213: 'dogs pa'i bshes su bsam nas bzod par bya'o //
NK047(tsi)001:214: rgyu mtshan gsum gyis chos zab mo la nges par bsam nas bzod pa sgom ste /
NK047(tsi)001:215: don dam stong nyid spros bral la bsam na gnod
NK047(tsi)001:216: bya gnod byed rang bzhin med pa la bsam nas
NK047(tsi)001:217: bzod pa sgom / kun rdzob rten 'brel sgyu ma
NK047(tsi)001:218: la bsam na thams cad rkyen gyis bskul bas gnod
NK047(tsi)001:219: byed dang sdug bsngal rang dbang med pa la bsam
NK047(tsi)001:221: zung 'jug rang gi sems nyid la bsam na khong
NK047(tsi)001:222: khro gzhi med rtsa bral du dag pa la bsam
NK047(tsi)001:223: nas bzod pa sgom par bya'o //
NK047(tsi)001:224: bzhi pa brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la /
NK047(tsi)001:225: mi mthun phyogs le lo gsum spang ba /
NK047(tsi)001:226: mthun phyogs stobs drug bskyed pa gnyis las /
NK047(tsi)001:227: dang po mi rtag pa'i lcags kyis bskul te sbyor ba med pa'i le lo spang /
NK047(tsi)001:228: dam pa'i chos kyi dga' ba la bsam nas bya ba ngan zhen gyi le lo spang /
NK047(tsi)001:229: rang gi sems gzeng bstod de sgyid lug gi le lo spang ngo //
NK047(tsi)001:231: dge ba'i phan yon dang sdig pa'i nyes dmigs la
NK047(tsi)001:232: bsam nas chos la mos pa bskyed pa sbyor ba
NK047(tsi)001:233: mos pa'i dpung / snying stobs kyi dam bca' brtan
NK047(tsi)001:234: pos brtsam pa'i dge rtsa mthar dbyung ba dngos gzhi
NK047(tsi)001:235: mos pa'i dpung / brtan pa'i dpung / 'di la gsum /
NK047(tsi)001:236: 'jig rten na nyi ma shar ba la dpe byas te /
NK047(tsi)001:237: bar chad gzhan dbang du mi gtong bar rkyen gyis bardzi ba med pa dang /
NK047(tsi)001:238: nyi ma gcig pur rgyu ba la dper byas te
NK047(tsi)001:239: bdag nyid gcig pu gzhan la mi ltos par bdud
NK047(tsi)001:240: sde pham par byas nas rdzogs pa'i byang chub bsgrub
NK047(tsi)001:241: pa dang / nyi ma kun la snang ba ltar
NK047(tsi)001:242: byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes snying rje smon pa
NK047(tsi)001:243: gsum gyis rang nyid 'gro ba'i nyer 'tshor byin gyis
NK047(tsi)001:244: brlabs te mkha' mnyam gyi 'gro don dang du blang
NK047(tsi)001:245: ba dang gsum las kyi nga rgyal /
NK047(tsi)001:246: bdag nyid mchog tu bltas te ltung ba phra rag
NK047(tsi)001:247: gis ma gos par bya ba nus pa'i nga rgyal
NK047(tsi)001:248: / nyon mongs rnams dman par bltas te mi mthun
NK047(tsi)001:249: phyogs khyad du gsod pa nyon mongs pa'i nga rgyal
NK047(tsi)001:250: / dang gsum mo // rang gi legs byas dge
NK047(tsi)001:251: rtsa sgrub pa la mchog tu dga' bar bsam nas
NK047(tsi)001:252: rnam smin la re ba med par spro ba dang
NK047(tsi)001:253: du blang ba khyad par dga' ba'i dpung /
NK047(tsi)001:254: rang nyid stobs nyams pa dang ha cang skyo bar
NK047(tsi)001:255: gyur pa na slar bya'i don du re zhig dor
NK047(tsi)001:257: dran pa dang shes bzhin gyi sgo nas nyon mongs
NK047(tsi)001:258: 'joms pa'i bya ba lhur blang nas spang bya 'joms
NK047(tsi)001:260: rang gi sgo gsum la dbang bsgyur te bag yod
NK047(tsi)001:261: kyi gtam dran pas bslab bya kun la rang dbang
NK047(tsi)001:262: gis slob pa dbang bsgyur gyi stobs dang stobs drug
NK047(tsi)001:263: go // lnga pa bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu
NK047(tsi)001:264: phyin pa la bsam gtan gyi mi mthun phyogs spangs
NK047(tsi)001:265: go // pa dang / zhi gnas kyi dmigs pa yid la bya ba gnyis /
NK047(tsi)001:266: dang po mi mthun phyogs spang ba la gnyis /
NK047(tsi)001:269: dang po 'jig rten spang ba ni /
NK047(tsi)001:272: 'khor g.yog la sogs nang sems can gyi tshogs la
NK047(tsi)001:273: chags nas de dag gi dbang du gyur na rang
NK047(tsi)001:274: gi sems rtse gcig tu mnyam par 'jog par mi
NK047(tsi)001:276: cad spangs te dgon pa dben pa la sogs par
NK047(tsi)001:278: der yang rnyed pa dang bkur sti /
NK047(tsi)001:280: 'phral dgos kyi yo byad sogs la chags nas de
NK047(tsi)001:281: dag don du gnyer na yang dag pa'i lam la
NK047(tsi)001:282: bar du gcod pas thams cad la re dogs bcad
NK047(tsi)001:283: de gang byung des chog la bslab /
NK047(tsi)001:284: gnyis pa rnam rtog dor ba ni /
NK047(tsi)001:285: lus dben par gnas shing ha cang yo byad sogs
NK047(tsi)001:286: don du mi gnyer yang sems 'dod pa'i dbang du
NK047(tsi)001:287: gyur na bsam gtan rnal ma rgyud la mi skye
NK047(tsi)001:288: zhing sems mnyam par 'jog mi nus pas de dag
NK047(tsi)001:289: spang dgos / khyad par gong ma'i ting nge 'dzin
NK047(tsi)001:290: khyad par can thob pa la 'dod pa'i 'dod chags
NK047(tsi)001:291: la blo log pa 'di gal che bas rgyu bsgrub
NK047(tsi)001:292: spang dgos / par dka' ba / ngo bo mi gtsang ba yin pa /
NK047(tsi)001:293: 'bras bu gnod pa mang ba la sogs la bsam
NK047(tsi)001:294: nas yul bud med kyi sred pa las blo log
NK047(tsi)001:295: nges bya / gzhan yang chos brgyad tshe 'di sgrub
NK047(tsi)001:296: pa'i rnam rtog thams cad dgra ltar bltas te zhe
NK047(tsi)001:297: 'dod ngan pa'i rtog ngan ji tsam skyes kyang de
NK047(tsi)001:298: dag gi nyes dmigs yun ring du bsam nas rang
NK047(tsi)001:299: la rang gi khrel btab ste snying thag pa nas
NK047(tsi)001:300: nges bya / spang bar bya'o // gnyis pa dngos gzhi bsam gtan bsgom pa la /
NK047(tsi)001:301: sgom tshul mang yang 'dir byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa la gnyis /
NK047(tsi)001:302: bdag gzhan mnyam pa bsgom pa dang /
NK047(tsi)001:303: bdag gzhan barje ba bsgom pa gnyis /
NK047(tsi)001:305: bdag dang sems can thams cad bde ba 'dod mnyam
NK047(tsi)001:306: du gcig sdug bsngal mi 'dod mnyam pa la bdag
NK047(tsi)001:307: gcig pu bsrung zhing gzhan mi bsrung ba ni rigs
NK047(tsi)001:308: pa ma yin pas bdag gzhan mnyam par sgom dgos
NK047(tsi)001:309: te / bdag dang gzhan du mnyam pa ni /
NK047(tsi)001:310: dang po nyid du 'bad de bsgom /
NK047(tsi)001:311: bde dang sdug bsngal mnyam pas na /
NK047(tsi)001:312: thams cad bdag bzhin bsrung bar bya /
NK047(tsi)001:313: zhes gsungs pa ltar thog mar bdag gzhan mnyam pa'i byang chub sems bsgom mo //
NK047(tsi)001:315: nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa'i sems can thams cad
NK047(tsi)001:316: bdag gis pha ma gnyen tshor ma gyur pa gang
NK047(tsi)001:317: yang med de / slob dpon klu sgrub kyis /
NK047(tsi)001:318: ma yi grangs mtha' rgya shugs tshig gu tsam //
NK047(tsi)001:319: ril bur dril kyang sa yis la nga ma yin //
NK047(tsi)001:320: zhes gsungs pa la sogs pa'i lung dang rigs pas
NK047(tsi)001:321: sems can thams cad rang gi nye dur thag bcad
NK047(tsi)001:322: la / de nas bzung bdag la bde ba skyes
NK047(tsi)001:323: pa na sems can thams cad bdag gi bde ba
NK047(tsi)001:324: dang bde ba'i rgyu 'di lta bu dang ldan par
NK047(tsi)001:325: gyur cig ces zhe thag pa nas bsgom /
NK047(tsi)001:326: yang bdag la sdug bsngal zhig skyes pa na bdag
NK047(tsi)001:327: dang sems can thams cad sdug bsngal dang sdug bsngal
NK047(tsi)001:328: gyi rgyu 'di lta bu dang bral bar gyur cig
NK047(tsi)001:329: snyam du snying gi khong rus pa'i gting nas bsgom
NK047(tsi)001:330: / de'i tshe bsam pa la gegs 'di lta bu skye srid de /
NK047(tsi)001:331: bdag gi sdug bsngal sel ba gzhan la mi re /
NK047(tsi)001:332: gzhan gyis sdug bsngal bsal ba bdag gis mi 'grub snyam pa nyan thos kyi blo skye na /
NK047(tsi)001:334: ma 'ongs pa yi sdug bsngal yang //
NK047(tsi)001:335: gnod mi byed na ji ltar bsrung //
NK047(tsi)001:336: zhes gsungs pa ltar rang nyid kyis nang par phan
NK047(tsi)001:337: chad kyi nad med pa dang zas gos la sogs
NK047(tsi)001:338: thob pa'i 'bad pa ji ste byed /
NK047(tsi)001:339: bdag skad cig gis 'gags nas de phan chad gzhan du 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
NK047(tsi)001:340: de la 'di snyam du ma rig pa'i bag chags
NK047(tsi)001:341: kyis nang par phan chad kyang bdag yin no snyam
NK047(tsi)001:343: bdag gis de ni myong snyam pa'i //
NK047(tsi)001:344: rnam par rtog pa log pa ste //
NK047(tsi)001:345: 'di ltar skye ba'ang gzhan nyid la //
NK047(tsi)001:346: 'chi ba yang ni gzhan zhig yin //
NK047(tsi)001:348: dper na blun po dag 'bab chu 'dis na ning
NK047(tsi)001:349: nga'i gos khyer ro snyam pa dang nang par chu
NK047(tsi)001:350: 'di brgal lo snyam du sems mod kyang /
NK047(tsi)001:351: na ning gos khyer ba'i chu de yang gzhan yin la /
NK047(tsi)001:352: nang par brgal ba'i chu de yang gzhan yin no //
NK047(tsi)001:353: de bzhin du 'das pa'i sems kyang bdag ma yin la /
NK047(tsi)001:354: ma 'ongs pa'i sems kyang bdag ma yin par gzhan yin no //
NK047(tsi)001:355: de la 'di snyam du ma 'ongs pa'i sems da
NK047(tsi)001:356: ltar gyi bdag ma yin yang bdag gi sems kyi
NK047(tsi)001:357: rgyun yin no snyam pa'i sems kyis rang don sgrub
NK047(tsi)001:358: po zhe na / sems can gzhan bdag ma yin
NK047(tsi)001:359: yang bdag gi sems can yin no snyam pa'i 'du
NK047(tsi)001:360: shes kyis gzhan gyi don la 'jug par bya'o //
NK047(tsi)001:361: gal te mgo gang gi kha ba sbug snyams pa'i tshul gyis rang rang gi don la 'bad kyis /
NK047(tsi)001:362: phan tshun gcig gi don gcig gis bsgrub mi nus so snyams na /
NK047(tsi)001:364: rkang pa'i sdug bsngal lag pas min //
NK047(tsi)001:365: zhes gsungs pa yang rkang pa la tsher ma zug pa yang lag pas ci ste 'don /
NK047(tsi)001:366: de bzhin du mig tu rdul song ba lag pas dang /
NK047(tsi)001:367: bu tsha'i don pha ma dang /
NK047(tsi)001:368: khar zas 'dzud pa lag pa la sogs pa yang
NK047(tsi)001:369: rang rang gi don byed dgos par 'gyur te ha
NK047(tsi)001:370: cang thal lo // mdor na phan tshun gcig gis
NK047(tsi)001:371: gcig gi don ma byas par rang rang gi don
NK047(tsi)001:372: bsgrub dgos na 'grub pa shin tu daka'o //
NK047(tsi)001:373: des na de ltar shes par byas la sems can gyi don la 'jug par bya'o //
NK047(tsi)001:374: gnyis pa bdag gzhan barje ba byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa yang /
NK047(tsi)001:376: bdag bde gzhan gyi sdug bsngal dag /
NK047(tsi)001:377: yang dag barje bar ma byas na //
NK047(tsi)001:378: sangs rgyas nyid du mi 'grub cing //
NK047(tsi)001:379: 'khor ba na yang bde ba med //
NK047(tsi)001:380: ces gsungs pa ltar bdag gi bde ba sems can la sbyin /
NK047(tsi)001:381: sems can gyi sdug bsngal bdag gis blang ngo //
NK047(tsi)001:383: dman sogs bdag tu byas pa dang //
NK047(tsi)001:384: gzhan nyid du ni bdag byas nas //
NK047(tsi)001:385: rnam rtog med pa'i sems kyis su //
NK047(tsi)001:386: phrag dog 'gran sems nga rgyal bsgom //
NK047(tsi)001:388: rang las dma' ba'i gnas su dgra bzhag /
NK047(tsi)001:389: dagra'am gzhan mthon po'i gnas su rang bzhag la rang
NK047(tsi)001:390: mtho ba de la dgra dma' ba des phrag dog
NK047(tsi)001:391: sgom du gzhug / bsgom de tshar ba na 'di lta bu'i bsgom pa'i bsam pa 'byung ste /
NK047(tsi)001:392: rang mthon por bsgom gzhan dma' bar bsgom par des
NK047(tsi)001:393: rang la phrag dog byas par bsgom pa la yang
NK047(tsi)001:394: 'di lta bu'i sdug bsngal 'byung na gzhan la phrag
NK047(tsi)001:395: dog byed pa gal 'thad ces phrag dog rang zhi
NK047(tsi)001:396: bar 'gyur ro // de bzhin du bdag dang mnyam
NK047(tsi)001:397: pa la bltas nas 'gran sems sgom pa yang bdag
NK047(tsi)001:398: dang mnyam pa'i dgra'i gnas su rang nyid bzhag rang
NK047(tsi)001:399: gi gnas su dgra de bzhag la dgra des phyogs
NK047(tsi)001:400: mtha' dag gi sgo nas bdag la 'gran par bsgom
NK047(tsi)001:401: bar 'gyur ro // mo // bsgom de grol na 'di lta bu'i bsam pa 'byung ste /
NK047(tsi)001:402: rang dgrar bsgom nas gzhan gyis gnod pa dang 'gran
NK047(tsi)001:403: sems byas par bsgom pa la yang 'di lta bu'i
NK047(tsi)001:405: gzhan la gnod pa dang 'gran sems byar ga la rung snyam nas 'gran sems rang bzhir 'gyur ro //
NK047(tsi)001:406: yang de bzhin nga rgyal bsgom pa yang rang bas dma' ba'i gnas su bdag nyid bzhag /
NK047(tsi)001:407: rang gi gnas su rang bas dma' ba de bzhag
NK047(tsi)001:408: la gzhan mtho ba des rang dma' ba de la
NK047(tsi)001:409: rigs dang yon tan la sogs pa'i sgo nas nga
NK047(tsi)001:411: bsgom de tshar ba na bdag la gzhan gyis nga
NK047(tsi)001:412: rgyal bsgom pa na 'di lta bu'i sdug bsngal 'byung
NK047(tsi)001:413: na de'i phyir bdag gi gzhan la nga rgyal byar
NK047(tsi)001:414: ga la rung snyam du nga rgyal ngo bo nyid
NK047(tsi)001:416: 'di dag gi don zhib tu spyod 'jug nas ji ltar 'byung ba bzhin nyams su blang bar bya'o //
NK047(tsi)001:417: de tsam bsgom par mi nus pas bsdus te bsgom par 'dod na /
NK047(tsi)001:419: bdag la de dag sdig smin zhing //
NK047(tsi)001:420: bdag bde ma lus der smin shog /
NK047(tsi)001:421: ji srid sems can 'ga' zhig kyang //
NK047(tsi)001:422: gang du ma grol de srid du //
NK047(tsi)001:423: de phyir bla na med pa yi //
NK047(tsi)001:424: byang chub thob kyang gnas gyur cig /
NK047(tsi)001:425: de skad brjod pa'i bsod nams 'di //
NK047(tsi)001:426: gal te de ni gzugs can 'gyur //
NK047(tsi)001:427: gang+ga'i bye ma snyed kyis ni //
NK047(tsi)001:430: gtan tshig kyang ni 'di la snang //
NK047(tsi)001:433: 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal gang ci'ang rung //
NK047(tsi)001:434: de kun bdag la smin gyur cig /
NK047(tsi)001:435: byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba yis //
NK047(tsi)001:436: 'gro ba bde la spyod par shog /
NK047(tsi)001:437: ces bya ba'i don sgom zhing ngag tu'ang brjod par bya'o //
NK047(tsi)001:438: de ltar bdag gzhan mnyam pa rje sgom tshul ni /
NK047(tsi)001:439: 'jam dbyangs sa pan gyi gsung las byung ba ltar bkod pa yin la /
NK047(tsi)001:440: 'grel pa rnams las 'di dang sgom tshul cung mi
NK047(tsi)001:441: 'dra tsam snang yang rang giblo la gang bde ltar
NK047(tsi)001:442: bsgoms par bya'o // drug pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la /
NK047(tsi)001:443: shes rab kyi ngo bo ngos bzung ba de yul bdag med la 'jug pa'o //
NK047(tsi)001:444: dang po shes rab kyi ngo bo ni /
NK047(tsi)001:445: mnyam bzhag gi dus su chos thams cad stong nyid du shes pa dang /
NK047(tsi)001:446: rjes thob tu sgyu ma dang rmi lam ltar bden
NK047(tsi)001:447: med du shes pa nyid shes rab kyi ngo bo
NK047(tsi)001:448: yin no // gnyis pa de yul bdag med la 'jug pa ni /
NK047(tsi)001:449: gang zag gi bdag med dang /
NK047(tsi)001:450: chos kyi bdag med bsgom pa'o //
NK047(tsi)001:451: dang po ni rmongs pa rnams las bsog pa po
NK047(tsi)001:452: dang 'bras bu myong ba po bdag gam gang zag
NK047(tsi)001:453: gam skyes bu'am sems can la sogs par gdags pa'i
NK047(tsi)001:454: gzhi de ka lus ngag yid gsum dang gcig pa
NK047(tsi)001:455: yin nam / tha dad pa zhig yin nam /
NK047(tsi)001:459: mi rtag pa zhig yin nam snyam pa la sogs
NK047(tsi)001:460: rigs pa du mas brtags shing dpyad pa blo 'khrul
NK047(tsi)001:461: pa'i dbang gis bdag med la bdag dang /
NK047(tsi)001:462: gzhan med la gzhan du bzung ba ma gtogs don
NK047(tsi)001:463: rang ngos nas grub pa'i bdag gam sems can cung
NK047(tsi)001:464: zad kyang med par thag bcad do //
NK047(tsi)001:465: gnyis pa chos kyi bdag med sgom pa dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi las /
NK047(tsi)001:466: dang po lus dran pa nye bar bzhag pa ni /
NK047(tsi)001:467: 'di ltar snang srid 'khor 'das kyis bsdus pa'i chos
NK047(tsi)001:468: thams cad kyang rang gi sems la snang zhing sems
NK047(tsi)001:469: kyis btags pa ma gtogs cung zad kyang med la
NK047(tsi)001:470: / sems de nyid kyang lus la brten /
NK047(tsi)001:471: lus kyi dbang du gyur pa yin pas na lus
NK047(tsi)001:472: la brtags par bya ste lus zhes bya ba de
NK047(tsi)001:473: yan lag tshogs pa 'di dag dang gcig gam tha
NK047(tsi)001:474: dad dam lus de dang po gang nas byung ba
NK047(tsi)001:475: yin / bar du da lta gar gnas /
NK047(tsi)001:476: mthar gar 'gro sogs brtags la lus rang bzhin med pa'i don la mnyam par bzhag /
NK047(tsi)001:477: yang lus la zhen pa skyes na rang gzhan gyi
NK047(tsi)001:478: lus mi gtsang ba sgyu ma lta bu sogs su
NK047(tsi)001:479: bsgom la lus kyi zhen pa spang ngo //
NK047(tsi)001:480: gnyis pa tshor ba dran pa nye bar bzhag pa ni /
NK047(tsi)001:481: tshor ba bde sdug 'di dag ni sred len sogs
NK047(tsi)001:482: nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi rtsa ba yin pas
NK047(tsi)001:483: sems dang gcig gam tha dad la sogs pa la
NK047(tsi)001:484: brtags la tshor ba rang bzhin med pa'i don sgom
NK047(tsi)001:485: zhing gzhan tshor ba thams cad sdug bsngal dang snying
NK047(tsi)001:486: po med pa la sogs par sgom par bya'o //
NK047(tsi)001:487: gsum pa sems dran pa nye bar bzhag pa ni /
NK047(tsi)001:488: tshogs drug gis bsdus pa'i sems rnam par shes pa'i
NK047(tsi)001:489: rigs rgyun 'di nyid snga phyi dang bzang ngan la
NK047(tsi)001:490: sogs pa du mar snang ba 'di rnams gcig pa
NK047(tsi)001:491: zhig yin nam / tha dad pa zhig yin nam /
NK047(tsi)001:495: dga' sdug chags sdang la sogs par snang ba'i sems 'di dag gcig yin nam /
NK047(tsi)001:496: tha dad pa zhig yin la sogs par brtags /
NK047(tsi)001:497: gcig yin na sems gcig la dga' sdug dang chags
NK047(tsi)001:498: sdang la sogs du mar snang ba'i rgyu ci yin
NK047(tsi)001:499: brtags / de dag gnas skabs rkyen gyi dbang gis byung ba yin snyam na /
NK047(tsi)001:500: rkyen cung zad kyis kyang ma bsgyur zhing yul gang
NK047(tsi)001:501: dang ma 'phrad pa'i sems rang gi ngo bo ji
NK047(tsi)001:502: lta bu zhig / de yod pa zhig gam /
NK047(tsi)001:505: mi rtag pa zhig snyam pa la sogs pa du
NK047(tsi)001:506: mas yang dang yang du brtags la sems gzhi med
NK047(tsi)001:507: rtsa bral du gtan la phab bo //
NK047(tsi)001:508: bzhi pa chos dran pa nye bar bzhag pa ni /
NK047(tsi)001:509: de ltar lus tshor sems gsum las gzhan pa'i 'du
NK047(tsi)001:510: shes dang 'du byed 'dus ma byas gsum gyis bsdus
NK047(tsi)001:511: pa'i chos thams cad kyang rgyu rkyen rten 'brel las
NK047(tsi)001:512: skyes pa'i phyir na rang bzhin bden par ma grub
NK047(tsi)001:513: pa'i stong nyid spros pa'i mtha' thams cad dang bral
NK047(tsi)001:514: bar gtan la phab nas kun rdzob sgyu ma rmi
NK047(tsi)001:515: lam lta bu'i rol pas chags bdun spang ba'i spyod
NK047(tsi)001:516: pa rgya mtsho la bslab cing /
NK047(tsi)001:517: don dam par chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis grub
NK047(tsi)001:518: pa rdul tsam yang med par shes pas gang la
NK047(tsi)001:519: yang zhen pa med par nyams su blang ngo //
NK047(tsi)001:520: 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal sman gcig bu /
NK047(tsi)001:521: bde ba thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas //
NK047(tsi)001:522: bstan pa rnyed dang bkur sti dang //
NK047(tsi)001:523: bcas te yun ring gnas gyur cig //
NK047(tsi)001:524: ces pa 'adi'ang a bu hral pos smras so //
